full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement ## Title Dell Rugged Server 2U (or Equivalent) with Warranty Support and Maintenance ## Reference SSC R158045 - BPM020838 - Dell Rugged Server 2U FQ - Amendment 004 ## Solicitation Number BPM020838/25588 ## Tender Status Expired ## Publishing Date 2024-02-12 ## Tender Closing Date 2024-02-27T14:00:00 ## Contact Information * Name: Sandra Ladouceur * Email: [Not Available] * Phone: 613-302-0766 * Fax: 613-960-6026 * Address: 180 Kent Street Ottawa
National Capital Region * Province: Ontario * Postal Code: K1G 4A8 * Country: Canada ## Description The Shared Services Canada is seeking to acquire a Dell Rugged Server 2U (or equivalent) with warranty support and maintenance for the Department of National Defense. The "Contract Period" is the entire duration during which the Contractor is obligated to perform the work, which starts on the date of award and ends when the warranty expires 5 years later. All deliverables must be received on or before March 28, 2024. To submit a bid, please register in the SSC P2P portal and log in to view and access solicitations. Submissions must be made through the P2P portal, and the P2P system will not permit submissions after the solicitation closing date. The P2P portal can be accessed at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca). ## Trade Agreements * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) ## Regions of Opportunity * Canada ## Contracting Entity * Shared Services Canada * Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada ## End-User Entities * Shared Services Canada * Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada ## General Information The SSC P2P portal is the exclusive means to submit bids for this solicitation. Please note that modifications have been made to extend the closing date pending client response to industry questions and to correct the solicitation number on RFQ documents. Amendment 004 details the changes made to the original
